articles.author: Molly Hennessy-Fiske
articles.title: Tour gives a glimpse inside Texas migrant youth shelter — cots, soccer and a Trump mural
articles.description: The former Walmart that’s been converted into a migrant shelter housed 1,469 youths Wednesday, enough to fill the high-school-style cafeteria and require added cots in dorm-style bedrooms to handle the overflow. The Casa Padre shelter in Brownsville drew nati…

articles.author: Molly Hennessy-Fiske
articles.title: 'Prison-like' migrant youth shelter is understaffed, unequipped for Trump's 'zero tolerance' policy, insider says
articles.description: Colleagues at a government-contracted shelter in Arizona had a specific request for Antar Davidson when three Brazilian migrant children arrived: “Tell them they can’t hug.” Davidson, 32, is of Brazilian descent and speaks Portuguese. He said the siblings — a…
